# work 𓅡𓎡𓂡

𓂓 •dvrkar / kvrkar

𓅜 𓐍 𓅱 𓏛 𓏥 | work ≈ 𓅡 𓎡 𓀀 | servant | ⲃⲱⲕ, ⲉⲃⲓⲁⲓⲕ, ⲃⲱⲕⲓ Bücker Buckler buttler 𓅡 𓎡 𓀀 | servant | Pflücker 𒌴 ur₄ 𒄯 ḪAR harvest "to pluck; to harvest" <> Plackerei 𓅡 𓎡 𓂡 | WORK, work (for someone), pay taxes, work (horses), carry out (a task), enslave |
𓅡 𓎡 𓂡 -ficiar -fector -factor @ factory

𓅡 𓎡 𓀀 𒈦𒂗𒆕 MAŠ.EN.KAK "workman"

work force @ factory

𐀺𐀒 woʳko Fοργός Werker worker "maker"
𐀸𐀭 weʳsa Fεσσα √faire werk work make 𐀁𐀸 e-weʳ έFει effort 𐀁𐀸 e-weʳ έFει effect 𐀺𐀽𐀤 wo-ze(qe) Fόρζει *Fόρκyω > όργω > έργω to work 𐀺𐀿 wo-zo Fόρζων working
